<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Result.first-&gt;second.isSimple()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Result.first-&gt;second.getIndex() ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">               (uint32&#95;t)<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a9cf141c9194799e2fa2d92de4c6e8ff0af9ad30d1f465ed151dd54cfeac2c09ff">SimpleTypeKind::NotTranslated</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On the second pass, update with index to remapped record. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (initially misbehaved) record will now come &#42;after&#42; other records</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// resolved in the first pass, with proper &#42;back&#42; references in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Result.first-&gt;second = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/globaltypetablebuilder/#a97e9a4ba8dca5e9fa5ada8f3b41653d9">nextTypeIndex</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SeenRecords.push&#95;back(StableRecord);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SeenHashes.push&#95;back(Hash);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Result.first-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/typeindex">TypeIndex</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/globaltypetablebuilder/#a77a93c8bf83d76706a8486e7df17c5d7">insertRecordBytes</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/typeindex">TypeIndex</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/globaltypetablebuilder/#a687150b7b72344ab40a6917b076404ce">insertRecord</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/continuationrecordbuilder">ContinuationRecordBuilder</a> &amp;Builder);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/globaltypetablebuilder/#aeab2148240167fc0e6cf93708b5bce1d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/typeindex">TypeIndex</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/globaltypetablebuilder/#aeab2148240167fc0e6cf93708b5bce1d">writeLeafType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a> = SimpleSerializer.serialize(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a>);</span></CodeLine>
